tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LocalFoodFestivals (
 festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 festival_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 location TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE local_food_festivals (
  festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  festival_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE festival_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT,
  festival_id INT REFERENCES local_food_festivals(festival_id),
  event_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE local_food_festivals (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE festival_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    reviewer_name TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (festival_id) REFERENCES local_food_festivals(festival_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LocalFoodFestivals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FestivalVendors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  festival_id INT,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE FestivalAttendees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  festival_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  ticket_type VARCHAR(50),
  ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE FestivalReviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  festival_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE local_food_festivals (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE festival_organizers (
    organizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organizer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE festival_attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    registration_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE festival_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE festival_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    review_date DATE NOT NULL
)
